plugins.name: example-plugin
plugins.description: A minimal example plugin demonstrating the basic plugin structure with agent, command, skill, and MCP configuration examples

plugins.name: development-agents
plugins.description: Backend (Go/Fiber/GORM) and frontend (SolidJS) development agents with opinionated code patterns from production codebases. Includes skills for logging, GORM, routing, DI, and API integration.
